summary: An internal email from a US Attorney's Office (likely Southern District of New York) regarding a press inquiry from ABC News about an imminent development related to 'Epstein Coconspirators'. The sender asks for information to brief the press office but notes they declined to comment to ABC.

events.title: ABC News inquiry about imminent Epstein development
events.description: ABC News contacted the US Attorney's Office with a tip that something related to Epstein coconspirators was imminent. The office declined to comment but internally sought information for press office edification.

keyFacts: ABC News received a tip in May 2020 about an imminent development regarding Epstein coconspirators.
The US Attorney's Office (likely SDNY) declined to comment on the tip.
The email shows internal coordination within the US Attorney's Office regarding press strategy for potential Epstein-related developments.
The subject line explicitly references 'Epstein Coconspirators', indicating ongoing investigative or prosecutorial focus.
The correspondence is dated May 2020, after Epstein's death but while investigations into associates were ongoing.
